content.question: In the sixth sentence of the fifth paragraph (“We may...do so”), the author places quotation marks around the phrase “bowl alone” primarily to

choices.label: question the validity of the phrase
dismiss the phrase as a commonplace
attribute the phrase to another author
signal an ironic perspective on the phrase

content.answer: attribute the phrase to another author

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
